  uid=5_29 heading "The Iyengar Method" level="2"
  uid=5_30 StaticText "Precision, alignment, and therapeutic healing through mindful practice"
  uid=5_31 StaticText "Iyengar Yoga is a precise and detailed approach to yoga asana (postures) and pranayama (breathing techniques). Developed by B.K.S. Iyengar, this method emphasizes proper alignment, use of props, and holding poses longer to develop strength, flexibility, and awareness."
  uid=5_32 StaticText "At Yog Chumbak, we specialize in therapeutic applications of Iyengar Yoga, helping students find relief from various physical ailments and mental stress through carefully guided practice."
  uid=5_33 heading "Benefits of Iyengar Yoga:" level="3"
  uid=5_34 StaticText "‚úì"
  uid=5_35 StaticText "Improved posture and alignment"
  uid=5_36 StaticText "‚úì"
  uid=5_37 StaticText "Increased strength and flexibility"
  uid=5_38 StaticText "‚úì"

  uid=5_41 StaticText "Therapeutic healing for injuries"
  uid=5_42 StaticText "‚úì"
  uid=5_43 StaticText "Better body awareness and balance"

  uid=5_50 StaticText "Suman Hora is a remarkable homemaker turned yogapreneur, married to a visionary entrepreneur and mother of 2. As a certified Pranic healer, she is on a mission to serve 100,000 people to help them reverse age themselves in life."
  uid=5_51 StaticText "Her journey represents the power of transformation at any age. She has opened her first flagship outlet by the name "Yog Chumbak", where ancient wisdom meets modern healing."
  uid=5_52 heading "One-to-One Therapies" level="2"

  uid=5_185 heading "Frequently Asked Questions" level="2"
  uid=5_186 StaticText "Everything you need to know about joining Yog Chumbak"
  uid=5_187 button "I go to Gym, do I need Yoga? ‚Ä∫"
  uid=5_188 StaticText "Absolutely! While gym workouts build muscle strength and cardiovascular fitness, yoga improves flexibility, balance, posture, and mental well-being. They complement each other perfectly."
  uid=5_189 StaticText "Many gym-goers find yoga helps prevent injuries, improves recovery time, and enhances overall performance. Plus, yoga addresses stress and mental health‚Äîbenefits that gym workouts alone cannot provide. Think of gym as building your house, and yoga as creating a home."
  uid=5_190 button "I am a working professional, when can I join classes? ‚Ä∫"
  uid=5_191 StaticText "We offer flexible timing specifically for working professionals across morning, afternoon, and evening slots:"
  uid=5_192 StaticText "Morning Batches:"
  uid=5_193 StaticText " 7:15-8:15am, 9:00-10:00am"
  uid=5_194 StaticText "Afternoon Batch:"
  uid=5_195 StaticText " 12:00-1:00pm (lunch break option)"
  uid=5_196 StaticText "Evening Batch:"
  uid=5_197 StaticText " 6:00-7:00pm (after work)"
  uid=5_198 StaticText "Each batch runs 3 days per week, giving you 12 classes per month. Choose the schedule that fits your routine. Many working professionals prefer our morning batches to start the day energized, or evening batches to unwind after work."
  uid=5_199 button "How many classes do you take? ‚Ä∫"
  uid=5_200 StaticText "Each batch gets 3 classes per week, totaling 12 classes per month."
  uid=5_201 StaticText "This frequency is intentionally designed for the Iyengar method, where we hold poses longer and focus intensely on alignment. Your body needs adequate rest between sessions to integrate the practice and build strength safely. Consistent 3x/week attendance shows better results than sporadic daily practice."
  uid=5_202 button "I have a chronic ailment, can I do yoga? ‚Ä∫"
  uid=5_203 StaticText "Yes, you absolutely should! However, chronic conditions require personalized attention rather than jumping into group classes."
  uid=5_204 StaticText "We strongly recommend coming in for a free assessment where we'll:"
  uid=5_205 StaticText "Evaluate your specific condition"
  uid=5_206 StaticText "Test your current flexibility and range of motion"
  uid=5_207 StaticText "Understand your pain triggers and limitations"
  uid=5_208 StaticText "Based on this assessment, we'll determine whether you're suited for our regular batches or would benefit more from one-to-one therapy sessions. Many of our students have found lasting relief from chronic pain, frozen shoulder, back issues, and knee problems through our therapeutic approach."
  uid=5_209 button "How is it different from Physiotherapy? ‚Ä∫"
  uid=5_210 StaticText "This is a great question! The key difference is scope and approach:"
  uid=5_211 StaticText "PHYSIOTHERAPY:"
  uid=5_212 StaticText " Works on the pain area only, providing symptomatic relief. If your knee hurts, physio treats your knee."
  uid=5_213 StaticText "YOGA (our approach):"
  uid=5_214 StaticText " Finds the SOURCE of the problem causing misalignment. Your knee pain might actually stem from hip misalignment, poor posture habits, or weak core muscles‚Äîissues built over years that you never noticed."
  uid=5_215 StaticText "We address:"
  uid=5_216 StaticText "Shoulder misalignment causing neck pain"
  uid=5_217 StaticText "Neck shortening from desk work causing headaches"
  uid=5_218 StaticText "Wrong posture habits causing back pain"
  uid=5_219 StaticText "Muscle imbalances creating joint stress"
  uid=5_220 StaticText "With yoga, you don't just work on fixing the pain‚Äîyou fix the ROOT CAUSES: postural habits, structural misalignments, and muscle imbalances. This comprehensive approach leads to lasting relief, not temporary band-aids. Think long-term transformation, not short-term fixes."
